variables
% ht is the height of the pyramid
% bsd is the bottom side length
% tsd is the top side length
% num is the total number of elements 
% decided not to use variables, hard coded coordinates instead
%ht=190e-9
%bsd=74e-9
%tsd=10e-9
%num=8
%l=25

element properties
% E G rho
steel

brick8 elements
